creator: emerson@tre-sc.gov.br
text:
mod_jk.conf file is not updated when a new app is deployed through ant manager
task (deploy).

and?

I assume that you think it should be. On this basis I am going to change this 
to an enhancement request for this feature.
creator: markt@apache.org
markt@apache.org
text:
This is sufficiently described in the second, related enhancement request.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 19996 ***
